text: Callippus may refer to: * Callippus of Syracuse (died 352/51 BC), an Athenian student of Plato and tyrant of Syracuse * Callippus (Calippus of Cyzicus, c. 370–300 BC), a Greek astronomer and mathematician * Callippus of Athens (fl. 279 BC), an Athenian commander in the Battle of Thermopylae (279 BC) * Calippus (crater), a small lunar crater * Calippus (genus), an extinct relation of the modern horse
title: Calippus
